import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FoodService } from '../services/food/food.service'; import { Tag } from '../shared/models/Tag'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tags', templateUrl: './tags.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tags.component.css'] }) export class TagsComponent implements OnInit { @Input() foodPageTags?:string[]; @Input() justifyContent:string = 'center'; tags?:Tag[]; constructor(private foodService:FoodService) { } ngOnInit(): void { if(!this.foodPageTags) this.tags = this.foodService.getAllTags(); } }
